snippet: The move stops what would have been the resumption of horse slaughters for the first time in seven years in the United States.
abstract: Judge Christina Armijo of Federal District Court temporarily halts plans by companies in New Mexico to start slaughtering horse, issuing restraining order in lawsuit brought by Humane Society of the United States and other groups; move stops what would have been resumption of horse slaughters for first time in seven years in country.
lead_paragraph: The move stops what would have been the resumption of horse slaughters for the first time in seven years in the United States.

headline.main: Federal Judge Halts Plans to Start Horse Slaughters
headline.print_headline: Federal Judge Halts Plans To Start Horse Slaughters

keywords.value: Humane Society of the United States
keywords.name: organizations
